org.jpac.plc

Class Transaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpac.plc.Transaction
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReceiveTransaction, TransmitTransaction

    public abstract class Transaction
extends java.lang.Object
    represents an i/o transaction

      • transact

        public abstract void transact()
                       throws java.io.IOException
        used to perform the transaction. Blocks, until the plc returns its acknowledgement
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • transact

        public abstract void transact(int waitCycles)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              ProcessException
        used to perform the transaction. performs a jpac await() operation for waitCycle cycles. If the PLC does not answer during this period of time a TransactionTimeoutException is thrown
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        ProcessException
